title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Apr. 26, 1897. Society Contributes Fifty Dollars Toward the New Bells for St. John Cautius Parish

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Apr. 26, 1897. SOCIETY CONTRIBUTES FIFTY DOLLARS TOWARD THE NEW BELLS FOR ST. JOHN CAUTIUS PARISH

body.p: The Mother of God Society of St. Josephat Parish contributed fifty dollars toward the purchase of the new bells for St. John Cautius Parish.
Sincere thanks are extended to the Society for its kind gesture. May it have the best success and blessing of God!
